name: T -90 PARSECS
description:
90 times FASTER THAN LIGHT! 90 PARSECS to reach your home planet! 90 percent hull DAMAGE and your ship goes BIG BANG in THE SPACE! Oh, and there are DROIDS also! 90 of them all *unconfirmed data*...

Survive in space or EVERYONE WILL HEAR YOU CRY!

Made for Slavic Game Jam 2016 by 90PARSECS:

Justyna "Nomi" Janicka

Piotr "Cobra" Michniewski

Grzegorz "Gregg" Bonikowski

ft. Liz Katrin (music, voices) - https://www.youtube.com/user/lizkatrin

https://www.facebook.com/90parsecs/
